summary.span: 取得表示儲存格架構自動調整大小模式的 結構。

span.span: Gets a structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.

value.span: 表示儲存格架構自動調整大小模式的 結構。

span.span: A structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料格為基礎的自動調整大小模式大小資料行，不包含資料行標頭中的儲存格的內容為基礎的資料行。The cell-based automatic sizing mode sizes columns based on the contents of cells in the column, not including column headers. 此調整大小模式會以展開如果內容的資料行大於目前的資料行大小捲動到檢視。This sizing mode will cause columns to expand if content that is larger than the current column size is scrolled into view. 內容捲動到檢視之後，將不會縮減資料行。The column will not shrink after the content is scrolled out of view.

.property valuetype System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength SizeToHeader
Public Shared ReadOnly Property SizeToHeader As DataGridLength
public: static property System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength SizeToHeader { System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength get(); };

span.span: Gets a structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.

value.span: 表示行首架構自動調整大小模式的 結構。

span.span: A structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標頭為基礎的自動調整大小模式大小只資料行行首的內容為基礎的資料行。The header-based automatic sizing mode sizes columns based on the contents of column headers only.
